Did the household eat any foods from grains in the past 24 hours? (e.g., porridge, bread, rice)

Did the household eat any pulses in the past 24 hours? (e.g., beans, peas, lentils)
Did the household eat any nuts and seeds in the past 24 hours? (e.g., peanut, sesame seeds, sunflower seeds)
Did the household eat any milk and milk products in the past 24 hours? (e.g., milk, yogurt)
Did the household eat any meat made from animal organs or blood in the past 24 hours? (e.g., kidney, heart)
Did the household eat any other types of meat or poultry in the past 24 hours? (e.g., beef, pork, lamb, goat, rabbit, chicken, duck)
Did the household eat any fish and seafood in the past 24 hours? (fresh or dried)
Did the household eat any eggs in the past 24 hours? (e.g., chicken eggs, duck eggs)
Did the household eat any dark green leafy vegetables in the past 24 hours? (e.g., lettuce, broccoli, spinach)
Did the household eat any vegetables or roots that are rich in vitamin A in the past 24 hours? (e.g., pumpkin, carrots, sweet potatoes, red pepper)
Did the household eat any other vegetables in the past 24 hours? (e.g., corn, cucumbers, green pepper, green beans, mushrooms, tomato, onion, eggplant)
Did the household eat any vitamin A-rich fruits in the past 24 hours? (e.g., ripe mango, ripe papaya, peach)
Did the household eat any other fruits in the past 24 hours? (e.g., apples, avocados, bananas, grapes, lemons, oranges, watermelon, pineapple)
Did the household use oil or fats for cooking in the past 24 hours? (e.g., butter, kukoma, kazinga, mulawe)
